document_data.mainbody:
The Song of Kaudies was a powerful song that became imbued with magic if performed by a bard.
When performed, the songs magic had a cointoss of a chance to negate effects of sound-based spells and abilities such as silence, great shout, command, and others.
By the , The Song of Kaudies was performed by some of the most experienced bards. It was heard being performed in the Ten-Towns of Icewind Dale and the village of Kuldahar.
